title: So my friend played on my account and got it suspended... how do i get my account unsuspended?
body: So i woke up this morning and logged on to find out my account is suspended. i found out my friend was toxic online the night before... I'll change my password so he cant get on it again, but is there a way to unsuspend my account?

replies.body:
While account sharing is against the Terms of Use, and each account owner is responsible for the actions on his or her account, Player Support has the final say in these matters, and I encourage you to reach out to them via:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Best of luck!

No.

You got involved with account sharing, which is a direct breach of the ToU and EULA. The account wont be unbanned.
